trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Beaver Falls
There were no other sightings in Beaver Falls on or around July 14th 1999
Summary: large suacer, at lease 30 red lights,
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my front yard in front of my house and I was walking to my grandma's house who is my neighbor. I was holding a pear of my boxers. I was little,and I would always look arround to see my surroundings out of fear of a animal would attack me. That is when I saw a large suacer. The suacer had at least 30 red lights all arround the edge of it. It was very big. It moved across the sky slowy. It was not a plane or helicopter, because I love planes and helicopters,and I know what they look like and sound like. It did not make any sounds. I saw it in the sky for about 15-20 seconds. I was scared so I ran down to my front purch. At first I thought it was a planes but I soon raelized it was not. I told my mom and she did not understand what I was describing to her. I lost sight of it when it started to head towards the woods and then it disappeared into the wood.
